category: Product > materials, treatments and surfaces (including paneling)
description_html:
A game changer in wall surfacing materials, Swick™ Natural Wall Coverings are thin, lightweight and flexible
veneers with a two-part polymer-mineral powder system fixed to a fiber weave backing which creates an elevated
industrial aesthetic. Handcrafted, Low VOC, Class A Fire Rated (upon request), and easy to install on curved or straight walls, millwork and more... this innovative material allows for an expanded vision of limitless possibilities for contract environments.
